participant_1.background:
I enjoy picking wild strawberries with my son on our weekend camping trips.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.
i used to wear a cape.
my guilty pleasure is mcdonald.

participant_2.background:
I work as a chef and love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes.
My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.
I enjoy writing poetry to express my emotions and cope with the challenges I've faced.
i have only one child.
i am in between classes.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Good, just finished teaching my culinary arts class and now I am heading home.
That's awesome! I used to want to be a chef but I am too short.
That's okay. There are plenty of other jobs in the culinary field.
I know, I am now a carpenter and I love it.
That's awesome. I love cooking for my family and friends.
Me too, I love to cook with my son on our weekend camping trips.
That sounds really fun. I wish I had more time to camp.
It's a lot of fun. We usually pick wild strawberries when we go.
That sounds delicious. I love strawberries.
Me too. I have a confession to make, my guilty pleasure is McDonald's.
I love McDonald's too. It's so good!
I know, it's my guilty pleasure.
We should go camping together sometime.
That would be fun! We could cook some of your delicious food.
That would be great! I love cooking for people.
Me too. It's so much fun to share food with people.
I agree. It's a great way to bring people together.
